title.rendered: Thanks, Manitoba Institute for Trades and Technology

content.rendered: Last week, representatives for Manitoba Institute for Trades and Technology came to visit the BC Program and students. They spoke to most of our Gr. 11 and 12 students, explaining how the college system works and their great internship programs they run. We are lucky to have another Canadian institution visiting The Canadian School, it’s a great opportunity for the students to consider post graduation.
